alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 20 at 2:25AM MST until March 20 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds up to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Locales along the eastern portion of the Little Colorado River Valley and across the White Mountains. * WHEN...The Wind Advisory is in effect from from 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. The High Wind Watch is in effect from late tonight through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
